= Introduction =

This is the central page for all documentation to !SymPy.

For examples of most features of !SymPy, look into [http://code.google.com/p/sympy/wiki/Examples Examples].

Driving ideas behind !SymPy are described in HowItWorks.

Description of !SymPy printing system is in [http://code.google.com/p/sympy/wiki/PrintingMathML PrintingMathML].

API documentation is here:
http://sympy.googlecode.com/svn/api/index.html

For some ideas, where Sympy can be used, see http://code.google.com/p/sympy/wiki/Motivation.
